abstract: Linn Energy, the Houston-based energy company that doubled its reserves this year by the purchase of Dominion Resources‘s gas deposits, will buy unspecified oil and gas assets from Lamamco Drilling for $552 million.
lead_paragraph: Linn Energy, the Houston-based energy company that doubled its reserves this year by the purchase of Dominion Resources‘s gas deposits, will buy unspecified oil and gas assets from Lamamco Drilling for $552 million.

headline.main: Linn Drills Down Deal for Lamamco Assets
